title: Liquor stores in vicinity of May Day demonstrations and rallies to be closed after 12 noon
body_lines: The Commissioner General of Excise has ordered that all the liquor stores in the vicinity of roads and rallies on the occasion of May Day, should be closed from 12.00 noon today until the end of the day.
The Excise Department said that the police has already announced the routes of the demonstrations and the venues for the rallies in respect of the May Day.
